BenQ x Eyes of a Nomad

Collaboration Proposal

Hey BenQ.
I love your brand, and think we could make some magic together.

Let me introduce myself.


@eyesofanomad


Photograher | Videographer | Content Creator | Adventurer | Teacher

I'm Emilio, aka Eyes of a Nomad

I'm a content creator from Melbourne Australia currently living the dream in Bali, Indonesia. I love helping brands capture the essence of their personality and really telling a story through my work.

I split my time between travelling the world, doing photography & videography for brands, and teaching the next generation of content creators through my school the Institute of Code.

I'm also currently creating an online photography course that will teach students from all over the world how to take epic photos & edit them in lightroom and photoshop, which is launching early 2019.

My Audience

Every single day I have people asking my advice for the perfect photography workflow -- whether it's followers on instagram, students at Institute of Code, or fellow content creators on group trips. I'm always seeking and sharing the latest tools to make life as a photographer easier, and when I find brands that I love, I can't talk about them enough.

My audience is predominately aspiring photographers, influencers and content creators. It's a premium audience that like to invest in quality (our course is a $4.5k investment), believe in the value of community, and generally love travel and adventure.

I've worked with some pretty amazing brands

I've worked with local and international fashion & lifestyle brands, luxury villas and hotels, cafes and restaurants, tour companies and more. My work has been featured by BBC, NYtimes, CNN, Discovery and is re-shared by major instagram accounts like @artofvisuals and @moodygrams. Just a few brands that I've worked with include...

  • The Mulia Resort
  • Pared Sunglasses
  • La Lunia Liveaboad (Luxury Komodo Cruises)
  • Magali Pascal
  • Bricks Milano
  • Ark Swimwear
  • Mimpi Mattress
  • Uluwatu Surf Villas
  • Allie Ayers (Sports Illustrated Model)

I know my audience would love BenQ, let's share it with them.

Objective

I really believe that photographers & content creators can dramatically improve their workflow and productivity by using an external monitor. Your monitor in particular, delivers exactly what content creators have been asking for - a color accurate screen with incredible features right out of the box, at a reasonable price. My objective is to help more people get as excited about your product as I am.

My Pitch

In exchange for gifting 1x 31.5in Professional Design Monitor (PD3220U), I would love to offer you...

  • 10x high resolution professionally edited photos showcasing the BenQ Monitor within a professional workflow in a beautiful office
  • 1x cinematic unboxing video shared on @eyesofanomad instagram story
  • 1x set of stories explaining why I love this monitor and what the features are.
  • Dedicated mention in one SEO optimised blog post 'Best Monitor for Photographers' on www.instituteofcode.com blog
  • included in a 'My Gear' story highlight for minimum of 12 months
  • 1x feature an instagram post with detailed caption about the product
  • include in our recommended purchase list for students of my in-person and online courses

Why I think we're the perfect fit.

I take my photography very seriously, and only invest in equipment and tools that will help take my content to the next level -- that's something my audience has come to know and expect about me, so they trust that I will only promote the highest quality products that I really believe in.

In 2019 I'll be teaching hundreds of students photography through IOC & my online courses, and I know that this is the perfect environment to showcase all the benefits of using a BenQ Monitor.
